bio: Mostly a Java developer, interested in solving problems and always looking for ways to learn new things. I'm also into cross-country skiing!

name: Samuel Braun
bio: My first programming language was Java. At the beginning it was quite challenging to write some code that does actually make sense. After a few days however, it became easier and fun to mess around with.

name: Paul Aly
bio: I've been developing in Java Professionaly for 5 years now. I'm passionate about writing clean code and learning new programming languages.

name: Marco Bolis
bio: I've been writing OO Java code for the last ten years or so. I also know a couple other languages and paradigms. I believe one should learn to think their code from many POVs. And dream big.
